agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: Appropriations - S/C on Articles VI, VII & VIII TIME & DATE: 7:30 AM, Wednesday, March 6, 2019 PLACE: JHR 110 CHAIR: Rep. Toni Rose The Appropriations Subcommittee on Articles VI, VII, and VIII will meet in a formal meeting to discuss riders. As a reminder no public or agency testimony may be taken during a Formal Meeting.
